org.bouncycastle.crypto.generators

Class DSAParametersGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bouncycastle.crypto.generators.DSAParametersGenerator

  • public class DSAParametersGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate suitable parameters for DSA, in line with FIPS 186-2, or FIPS 186-3.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

      DSAParametersGenerator(Digest digest)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(int size,
        int certainty,
        java.security.SecureRandom random)
        initialise the key generator.
        Parameters:
        size - size of the key (range 2^512 -> 2^1024 - 64 bit increments)
        certainty - measure of robustness of prime (for FIPS 186-2 compliance this should be at least 80).
        random - random byte source.

      • init

        public void init(DSAParameterGenerationParameters params)
        Initialise the key generator for DSA 2.

        Use this init method if you need to generate parameters for DSA 2 keys.

        Parameters:
        params - DSA 2 key generation parameters.

      • generateParameters

        public DSAParameters generateParameters()
        which generates the p and g values from the given parameters, returning the DSAParameters object.

        Note: can take a while...
